txt.en: 'A little while ago, I was looking around the Thing-fold, admiring the grand and ancient structures, when I heard someone talking whose voice I did not recognize.'
'Why not receive it yourself, then?'
'Excellent!'
'I do not believe you foolish enough to attempt to kill me. Not by yourself.'
'It is my hope that the one chosen... will be you.'
'...Yes. What is this, really?'
'Kill you? Oh no, I would never wish harm on my prized pupil. Do you still not trust me?'
'Of course. It will be our secret, then.'
'Hmm. Distrust is in our nature.'
'It is no mere trinket. It is the very staff Drugoth himself wielded in his physical form. It is the weapon of a powerful Gaunt-lord.'
'A private conversation between those two must be important, so I moved into position to eavesdrop.'
'No, but you will soon. Your strength and cunning have made you a natural.'
'While the Warlord has his own reasons for marching up the Father's Path, the Cult of Drugoth has other aims, and they require that staff.'
'So? What was so important that we had to meet alone?'
Talk to Kyrstig
Listen to the conversation
'Dushtalb√∫k must not find out about this. The Warlord is prone to envy.'
'The ritual would make you incredibly powerful. I can think of none more deserving.'
Scout Kyrstig has an important report to share: a secret meeting between Loknashra and the leader of the Cult of Drugoth hints at their true motives in the region....
'The fell spirits are easily called from the winds at this high elevation. We have need of them in all their legions to fuel a ritual.'
'What ritual?'
'I understand. It is a useful survival instinct.'
Kyrstig is describing what she saw transpire between the Angmarim cultist and Loknashra.\n\nYou should listen to the conversation.
'Hah... my duty has always been to teach, to spread the word of our master. If you accept, I will facilitate your transition to our new leader.'
'When I got close, I realized it was an Angmarim Man, and Loknashra!'
'You can sense the power coursing through it, can you not?'
'Why me? I have not yet mastered your magic.'
Kyrstig is ready to describe what she saw earlier.\n\nYou should talk to Kyrstig.
'A secret ritual? This sounds like something we should try and prevent!'
'...I accept. I will use this new power to win this war in the name of the Frost-horde.'
'I wished to speak with you about the staff you reclaimed from the [placeholder].'
'A ritual to impart the power of the Gaunt-lord to a chosen member of our cult, the new wielder of the Staff of Drugoth.'
Instance: A Clandestine Meeting
